metadata.title: CVE-2022-32091 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: MariaDB v10.7 was discovered to contain an use-after-poison in in __interceptor_memset at /libsanitizer/sanitizer_common/sanitizer_common_interceptors.inc.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.5 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
